page.title: 11CHILDREN'S ATTITUDES.
page.content: { Nick Curtis. Nick likes the school, because it has good facilities. His favourite lessons are Maths and Science. Maths, because not there isn't too much writing involved,and science because it has practical work to do. { Cheryl Lerpiniere. Cheryl likes some of the school outings like when she goes on a full day trip or like Lulworth for about a week. {Gregory Thomson. Greg doesn't like having homework because it doesn't give him enough time to do anything else. {Kirsten Boundy. Kirsten likes the school because there's a lot of activites to do.Her favourite lessons are Humanities and English.Her group tutor is strict but she can also be very amusing.
